# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the content blocker is enabled.

## Declaration

```swift
var isEnabled: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the content blocker is enabled; otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
